mapper.delete: delete from image where item_num=#{ item_num }
mapper.insert: insert into image( item_num, detail_img ) values( #{ item_num }, #{ detail_img } )
mapper.select: select it.item_num ,ca.cate_num, it.item_price, it.item_stock, ca.cate_name, it.item_name, it.item_unit, it.item_weight, it.item_img, it.item_guide, it.item_title, it.item_subtitle, it.item_detail from item it, category ca where (it.cate_num = ca.cate_num) and it.item_num=#{ item_num }
